discord: Join the discord and please let us know what you thought !
warning:
Thank you for playing Gleep Gym! This game was created as part of the GameDev.JS 2024 jam in 13 days with the theme 'POWER'.

The game and the website www.gleep-gym.club do not use cookies for tracking and analysis, do not rely on advertising, and do not share information with third parties.

A sequence in the game contains visual effects that may trigger epileptic seizures in some individuals, so please play with caution and consult a healthcare professional if you experience any symptoms.
gerantDesc: hello its me again im in the window, so are you ready for a very well thought out gym tutorial?? Maximinigames-machine o-tron, switch to training mode !!!
sorciDesc: i will turn you into an apple... unless you can unravel my plans.. HA.. and don't think i am alone... i have all my friends to back me... hh yes
slavgrannyDesc: Ax ti xouligan you try to test me you? But you look like a big blob of haladets? OPAAAAAAA Let's the duel begin
coachDesc: You think you can stop our invasion, mister flabby ? Try me first!
trainerDesc: Dear network, don't you want to #grind your #powerlevel too ?? Why not go for an entertaining and enterprising journey with my new training course, discover a unique set of 7 minigames that will know how to entertain and train you !!
gleepGangDesc: HEY you there hey let me challenge you on a cosmic dance fight !! do you accept pleas please please?!?!
wizardStart: YOU ARE TRAPPED IN A CULINARY DELIGHT !!!!
welcomeGym: Explore the mysterious building where i am....
meetupGym: Meet francis, Gleep gym's owner, and register
grindGym: Explore the club and grow your power level
objectiveCoach: Reach the heart of the gym
